reference.title: Discord Interface
reference.shortdesc: Here you will find information about Discord's Interface.

section.title: Servers
section.p: The column on the left side of your Discord application is your server list. When you join a server you will see its icon pop up in the server list.

section.title: Channels
section.p: The column next to the server list shows the text and voice channels in which you can take part in. Each server has their own channels.

section.title: Text Chat
section.p: The component in the middle of the application is the text messanger. Here members of a server can write to each other.

section.title: Member List
section.p: The column on the right side of the application is the member list. It displays all the members a server has and whether or not they are online.
